[[inst_xor]]
==== XOR

*Syntax:* xor SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.not}><<<shamt>, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Bitwise XOR (exclusive OR) operation.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_xor.svg[XOR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
